com.lonepulse.robozombie.proxy
Class InvocationContext

java.lang.Object
  com.lonepulse.robozombie.proxy.InvocationContext

public final class InvocationContext
extends Object

Represents a single request invocation on an endpoint proxy. The context comprises of both runtime information and request or endpoint metadata, as well as a reference to the proxy instance on which the request was invoked.

InvocationContexts can be created using a new InvocationContext.Builder supplied via newBuilder().

Each context is pseudo-immutable to the extent that its shallow-state cannot be altered and neither can its deep-state with the exception of any mutable arguments accessed via getArguments().

Since:
1.3.0

Version:
1.1.0

Author:
Lahiru Sahan Jayasinghe
